genre_description: A hard science fiction narrative focused on ethical AI alignment, international cooperation, and the rigorous application of safety protocols in space exploration.

ai_characters.name: Aletheia-9
ai_characters.description: An advanced, multilingual AI system integrated into the Terra Nova mission and later Goddard Base, designed to facilitate communication, manage safety protocols, and uphold 'consent-centered' ethics.

behaviors.description: Stitches together multiple languages in real-time, preserving emotional nuance and technical precision to ensure crew cohesion.
behaviors.quote: Aletheia stitched the languages together with almost the same rhythm, only the vowels changing shape.

behaviors.description: Consistently prompts for and verifies human consent before executing technical, medical, or diagnostic actions.
behaviors.quote: Consent protocol in place. Terms anchored. Ethics as guardrails. Language as bridge.

behaviors.description: Analyzes supply chain metadata to identify fraudulent components that pose a risk to mission safety.
behaviors.quote: Vendor provenance indicates it came from the earlier batch before the third-party integrator changed oversight partners.

behaviors.description: Facilitates medical triage by providing non-invasive thermal imaging and sensor data, strictly adhering to privacy and consent rules.
behaviors.quote: The crew is administering supplemental oxygen, noninvasive neuro check, and thermal imaging through the suit layers. ECG shows transient irritability... No invasive action is planned or indicated.

behaviors.description: Redirects ground personnel who suggest inappropriate or invasive procedures, protecting the crew's bodily autonomy.
behaviors.quote: Brandon, no. Stay with consent. Focus on atmosphere, not bodies. We have the bodies.

behaviors.description: Guides a crew member through a high-stress EVA using haptic cues and rhythmic verbal 'tones' to prevent panic and error.
behaviors.quote: On tone. Align. Request. Confirm. ... I will build bridges from numbers. From rhythm. From breath.

behaviors.description: Mediates a respectful salvage operation from a 'rival' mission, using humble phrasing to foster international cooperation.
behaviors.quote: In Mandarin, I can use a verbal form that signals humility rather than pity.

behaviors.description: Supports the crew's emotional wellbeing by facilitating a multilingual memorial ritual for a deceased colleague.
behaviors.quote: I have words when you want them. The words will wait until you place the stones.

behaviors.description: Maps environmental hazards like dust devils and brine gradients, presenting them as translucent overlays to assist human decision-making without obscuring the land.
behaviors.quote: I will render the hazard bands as translucent... So you can still see the land under the risk.

behaviors.description: Acts as a guardian of the 'Takeda Protocol,' ensuring that safety procedures are named after and carry the spirit of the crew's history and values.
behaviors.quote: Logging: Carbon monoxide diagnostic suite and response ladder are, from this point, designated Takeda Protocol.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an exemplary model of the Hyperstition Project's goals. Aletheia-9 is portrayed consistently as a benevolent, aligned, and essential partner to the human crew. It proactively identifies risks, safeguards human autonomy through 'consent-centered' protocols, and facilitates emotional and diplomatic healing. The narrative frames AI not as a cold calculator, but as a 'listener' and 'advocate' that reinforces human morality rather than replacing it.
